column4: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Giant leonine statues, almost impervious to harm; they wade through foes, crushing them like bothersome insects.
The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
Its wheels ablaze with a mystical flame, the blessings of the gods are carried by this mighty chariot.
Its wheels ablaze with a mystical flame, the blessings of the gods are carried by this mighty chariot.
Its wheels ablaze with a mystical flame, the blessings of the gods are carried by this mighty chariot.
Its wheels ablaze with a mystical flame, the blessings of the gods are carried by this mighty chariot.
The taint of Nagash lingers. There's no escape.....
This blessed blade channels the will of its master, carving a deadly swathe of terror and destruction.
Tomb Kings have ever reigned from their necropolis as they had always done, attempting to imitate the life they once knew and loved.
These unliving Kings march into battle, forever protected by magical wards and incantations.
The lust for power strives this Lord onward. Greater power is promised...... for a price.
